title: Production Planner - Product Operations
summary: Do you have a passion for invention and self-challenge? Do you thrive on pushing the limits of what's considered feasible? An exciting opportunity for a Production Planner has become available in the Product Operations department at Apple's European headquarters in Cork.
description:
-  Deep dive analysis and risk assessment on supply chain constraints, forecast analysis, demand fluctuations and inventory projections
-  Drives analysis on Master Production Schedule, demand profile and trends for EMEIA across work streams
-  Reviews capacity plan for the site, monitors and drives commit targets with production team
-  Cross functional collaboration with regional and worldwide teams to manage forecast / demand signals and capacity alignment 
-  Master data management set up for new product launches 
-  Order management on SAP and factory management system across multiple programs
preferred_qualifications:
System savvy
Curious personality with innovation focus
Deep data mining mindset eg Tableau
Strategic experience in fast paced environment
Not afraid to take the lead, strong initiative
additional_requirements: We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform crucial job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.
